attributes.action: Understand and acknowledge the importance and benefits of the private car
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to acknowledge
     the benefits cars bring

     Will the PM please acknowledge the immense benefits and improvements
     to our standard of living the private car has given us all. Will he
     recognise the vast sums of revenue raised from motorists every year that is not re invested in the roads.Please will he  pay far more heed to
     the interests of the majority of motorists rather than the
     minority environmental pressure groups who do not speak for the
     majority of the population. Please will he promise to abandon plans to increase taxation of
     motorists by any road pricing schemes and reduce fuel taxation
     to a more sensible level.Public transport should be self
     financing and not subsidised by motorists. The government should give motorists a fair deal and not tax them off the roads

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
